text: Indu nim'ma palige ella sud'dha vastugalannu sam'matagolisalagide. Innu, granthadavara aharavu nim'ma palige sam'matavagide mattu nim'ma aharavu avara palige sam'matavagide. Hageye, visvasigalallina susila striyaru mattu nimaginta munce dharmagrantha nidalagiddavarallina susila striyaru nim'ma palige sam'mataragiddare â€“ nivu avarige avara sulka (vivahadhana)vannu pavatisida balika. Nivu (avara jote, vivahada) niyamagalannu kattu nittagi palisuvavaragirabeku, anaitika vyavaharagalalli todagirabaradu mattu nivu gupta nantugalannu posisabaradu.
